work.summary: Modernizing the platform from server configuration to browser UI.
highlights: Add support for subscriptions via credit card (Ruby, Javascript).
Bare-metal server provisioning, monitoring, logging and alerting (Bash, Perl).
Replace flash download & back-end excel generation with modern browser solution (Javascript).
Stack: Passenger, Apache httpd, MySQL, Monit, Munin, Nagios and Ubuntu.
Pushing forward the launch of Apple Maps integration with Booking.com (Perl).
Back-end of maps in hotel page & search result. A/B testing with millions users every day (Perl).
Part of fire-fighting team. Support many engineers for code rollout and production issues.
Stack: uWSGI, Ngnix, MySQL, Puppet, Redis, Hadoop, Graphite and Debian.

work.summary: Leading the change from legacy PHP & XML gallery to modern NodeJS & PostgreSQL for +200K domains.
highlights: Back-end JSON APIs (PHP), then later using NodeJS.
Unifying development environments with Vagrant & Puppet.
Contributing components: apache modules (C), video encoding (Perl), video player (Actionscript).
Stack: PostgreSQL, Apache httpd, Varnish, Gearman, Redis, Puppet and Debian.

work.summary: Code for @Scale, part of multi-location team, products for millions of users running on +1000 servers.
highlights: Launch Y! News for mobile in Arabic using Yahoo! Blueprint (PHP), delivering the product for 17 countries.
Part of Y! Mail team to launch the product in Arabic with bidirectional support (Javascript).
Stack: Zend Framework, Apache httpd, MySQL, Memcache, Apache Traffic Server and Redhat.

education.institution: Jordan University of Science and Technology
courses: Two scholarships. Designed an indoor positioning system (C#).
